name: proofvault
description: Decentralized file certification and timestamping on Filecoin

scripts.setup: npm install && cd contracts && npm install
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network hardhat
scripts.contracts:deploy:amoy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network polygonAmoy
